description: Captain America (Steven "Steve" Rogers) is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by cartoonists #JoeSimon and #JackKirby, the character first appeared in Captain America Comics #1 (cover dated March 1941) from Timely Comics, a predecessor of #MarvelComics. Captain America was designed as a patriotic supersoldier who often fought the Axis powers of World War II and was Timely Comics' most popular character during the wartime period.
